languages.text: "Похоже, кто-то вмешался в поток данных, причем с использованием секретных шифров династии. Могу только предположить, что мы столкнулись с дополнительной мерой защиты, оставленной леди Теодорой".

"There appears to have been an intrusion into the data stream, one that was executed using the dynasty's secret codes. I can only assume that we have encountered an additional security measure installed by Lady Theodora."
languages.original_text: "Похоже, кто-то вмешался в поток данных, причем с использованием секретных шифров династии. Могу только предположить, что мы столкнулись с дополнительной мерой защиты, оставленной леди Теодорой".

traits.locale_text: "There appears to have been an intrusion into the data stream, one that was executed using the dynasty's secret codes. I can only assume that we have encountered an additional security measure installed by Lady Theodora."

"There appears to have been an intrusion into the data stream, one that was executed using the dynasty's secret codes. I can only assume that we have encountered an additional security measure installed by Lady Theodora."

"There appears to have been an intrusion into the data stream, one that was executed using the dynasty's secret codes. I can only assume that we have encountered an additional security measure installed by Lady Theodora."

"There appears to have been an intrusion into the data stream, one that was executed using the dynasty's secret codes. I can only assume that we have encountered an additional security measure installed by Lady Theodora."

"There appears to have been an intrusion into the data stream, one that was executed using the dynasty's secret codes. I can only assume that we have encountered an additional security measure installed by Lady Theodora."

languages.text: «Parece que se ha producido una intrusión en la corriente de datos, ejecutada con los códigos secretos de la dinastía. Solo puedo suponer que se trata de una medida de seguridad adicional de lady Theodora».
languages.original_text: "There appears to have been an intrusion into the data stream, one that was executed using the dynasty's secret codes. I can only assume that we have encountered an additional security measure installed by Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: «Parece que se ha producido una intrusión en la corriente de datos, ejecutada con los códigos secretos de la dinastía. Solo puedo suponer que se trata de una medida de seguridad adicional de lady Theodora».

languages.text: “我们的数据流似乎遭到了入侵，有人使用王朝的秘密代码进行了访问。我唯一能想到的可能性，就是西奥多拉夫人生前曾在这里设置过额外的安保措施。”
languages.original_text: "There appears to have been an intrusion into the data stream, one that was executed using the dynasty's secret codes. I can only assume that we have encountered an additional security measure installed by Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: “我们的数据流似乎遭到了入侵，有人使用王朝的秘密代码进行了访问。我唯一能想到的可能性，就是西奥多拉夫人生前曾在这里设置过额外的安保措施。”

languages.text: « Apparemment, une intrusion a eu lieu dans les flux de données, et ce, à l'aide des codes secrets de la dynastie. Il faut croire que nous sommes tombés par hasard sur une mesure de sécurité supplémentaire installée par dame Théodora. »
languages.original_text: "There appears to have been an intrusion into the data stream, one that was executed using the dynasty's secret codes. I can only assume that we have encountered an additional security measure installed by Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: « Apparemment, une intrusion a eu lieu dans les flux de données, et ce, à l'aide des codes secrets de la dynastie. Il faut croire que nous sommes tombés par hasard sur une mesure de sécurité supplémentaire installée par dame Théodora. »

languages.text: 「データストリームに邪魔が入っていたようですが、一つは王朝の秘密のコードで実行されていたと思われます。考えられるとすれば、私たちがレディ・シオドーラによってインストールされた追加のセキュリティ対策に遭遇した可能性があります」
languages.original_text: "There appears to have been an intrusion into the data stream, one that was executed using the dynasty's secret codes. I can only assume that we have encountered an additional security measure installed by Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: 「データストリームに邪魔が入っていたようですが、一つは王朝の秘密のコードで実行されていたと思われます。考えられるとすれば、私たちがレディ・シオドーラによってインストールされた追加のセキュリティ対策に遭遇した可能性があります」

languages.text: "Veri akışına, hanedanlık gizli kodları kullanılarak izinsiz giriş yapılmış gibi görünüyor. Leydi Theodora'nın koydurttuğu ek bir güvenlik önlemiyle karşılaşmış olabileceğimiz dışında bir seçenek aklıma gelmedi."
languages.original_text: "There appears to have been an intrusion into the data stream, one that was executed using the dynasty's secret codes. I can only assume that we have encountered an additional security measure installed by Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: "Veri akışına, hanedanlık gizli kodları kullanılarak izinsiz giriş yapılmış gibi görünüyor. Leydi Theodora'nın koydurttuğu ek bir güvenlik önlemiyle karşılaşmış olabileceğimiz dışında bir seçenek aklıma gelmedi."

languages.text: "Es scheint einen Eingriff in den Datenstrom gegeben zu haben, der mit den Geheimcodes der Dynastie erfolgt ist. Ich kann nur vermuten, dass wir auf eine zusätzliche Sicherheitsmaßnahme von Lady Theodora gestoßen sind."
languages.original_text: "There appears to have been an intrusion into the data stream, one that was executed using the dynasty's secret codes. I can only assume that we have encountered an additional security measure installed by Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: "Es scheint einen Eingriff in den Datenstrom gegeben zu haben, der mit den Geheimcodes der Dynastie erfolgt ist. Ich kann nur vermuten, dass wir auf eine zusätzliche Sicherheitsmaßnahme von Lady Theodora gestoßen sind."
